proposal: Heard about Zuzu, the pup rescued by the kind folks of Zuzalu and linked to Ethereum's very own Vitalik? 🐶 With 32 holders in the ETH network, you're growing a community that's as loyal as man's best friend. Why not give them more reasons to wag their tails? Deploy your own DEX or host a lottery with our tools, and let's make the Zuzu community even more vibrant. Who knows, maybe Zuzu will be the first pup to run a DEX! 🐾
